sentences.en: A camera takes a tiny microfilm photograph of each page of the form.
sentences.cn: 照相机把表格的每一页拍成极小的缩微(照)片.

sentences.en: A device for reading materials in microform, such as microfilm and microfiche.
sentences.cn: 显微阅读器用以阅读缩微成像, 如缩微胶卷和缩微平片上的材料的仪器.

sentences.en: A device used to produce computer output on microfilm.
sentences.cn: 用于产生计算机输出缩微胶片的设备.

sentences.en: Can I get a photocopy of some material on microfilm?
sentences.cn: 我可以复印缩微胶片上的一些资料 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can I get a xerox of some material on microfilm?
sentences.cn: 我可以复印缩微胶片上的上些资料 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can I get a Xerox of some material on microfilm?
sentences.cn: 我可以复印一些微缩胶片上的资料 吗 ?

sentences.en: Figure 1 Surface gloss of a popular microfilm & micro hybrid resin - composite.
sentences.cn: 图1普通的微填料和微混合树脂复合材料的表面光泽.

sentences.en: Getting the microfilm had been easy enough with her security clearance.
sentences.cn: 凭着她的安全卡,微缩胶卷很容易就到手了.

sentences.en: If you use the atlases on microfilm, copies are easily made.
sentences.cn: 如果利用微缩胶片地图集, 那么很容易制作拷贝.

sentences.en: In micrographics a device for holding a frame, or frames, of microfilm.
sentences.cn: 在缩微图形技术中,用于固定一帧或多帧缩微胶片的装置.

sentences.en: It was to harbor drawers brimming with reference books, microfilm and bibliographic cards.
sentences.cn: 操作台的抽屉里塞满了参考书、缩微胶片和各种书目卡片。

sentences.en: Send the 1990 correspondence to be microfilm or for microfilm.
sentences.cn: 把1990年的信函送去摄制成缩微胶卷.

sentences.en: Shawcross said the Saturn 5 blueprints are held at the Marshall Space Flight Center on microfilm.
sentences.cn: 肖克罗斯说土星5号蓝图保存在马歇尔太空飞行中心的缩微胶片上。

sentences.en: Such information is easily transferred onto microfilm.
sentences.cn: 这种信息很容易转存到缩微胶卷上。

sentences.en: The present invention relates to jade screen microfilm and its preparation process.
sentences.cn: 本发明涉及一种玉屏风微丸和玉屏风微丸制备方法.

sentences.en: They are listed on the closely guarded microfilm.
sentences.cn: 它们列于一卷严格保管的缩微胶卷上.

sentences.en: This vodka bottle, as well as this jar of face cream, were used to transport microfilm.
sentences.cn: 像这个伏特加酒瓶，还有这罐面霜，都是用来传送缩微胶卷的。

sentences.en: Tomorrow we'll look at microfilm records for several months back.
sentences.cn: 明天我们将去检查前几个月的缩微胶卷记录.

trans.tran_en: a type of film on which pictures and writing can be made very small, so that large amounts can be stored easily
